title: _act_
author: _act_
content: Quote from: Huppercase on October 02, 2023, 10:19:09 AMQuote from: _act_ on October 02, 2023, 07:51:50 AMIn addition, if you want to be a DT2 member, someone in DT1 must add your to his trust list. If you want to become a DT1 member, theymos must add you to it.Not necessary DT1 must include you to become DT2, numbers of DT2 can include you to become a DT2 also.I have always thought that a member on this forum that is not a DT member before can only become DT2 if someone in DT1 add the person to the his or her trust lists until I saw this Huppercase posts not quite long. Is Huppercase correct?

comments.author: jokers10
comments.body: No, incorrect. Number here means depth from your account (for DT â€” from DefaultTrust). Those who added by someone himself in his own trust list are T0 (where DefaultTrust (DT0) is added by default). Those who are added by those ones who in T0 are T1, who are in the lists of T1 are T2, etc. Depth up to 4 (2 by default). So to be at DT2 the one needs to be in a Trust list of someone from DT1.

comments.author: Huppercase
comments.body: Quote from: _act_ on October 02, 2023, 10:35:41 AMQuote from: Huppercase on October 02, 2023, 10:19:09 AMQuote from: _act_ on October 02, 2023, 07:51:50 AMIn addition, if you want to be a DT2 member, someone in DT1 must add your to his trust list. If you want to become a DT1 member, theymos must add you to it.Not necessary DT1 must include you to become DT2, numbers of DT2 can include you to become a DT2 also.I have always thought that a member on this forum that is not a DT member before can only become DT2 if someone in DT1 add the person to the his or her trust lists until I saw this Huppercase posts not quite long. Is Huppercase correct? I have been corrected from the older thread.You can also refer to the first thread to see the correction. More inputs from here will clear some doubts too.Thanks for the attention.

comments.author: Despairo
comments.body: My suggestion is you need to wait before creating a new thread because Meta isn't a quiet section.You've correctly understand if someone can become DT2 after there's a DT1 include in their trust list. Am just thinking this thread like, "hey people come here, look this guy is still not understand about DT system".
